articles.content: After launching the OnePlus Nord CE earlier this month, OnePlus is now gearing up to launch the OnePlus Nord 2. Over the last few months, we’ve seen quite a few leaks about the device that have revea… [+1985 chars]

articles.author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/mat-smith
articles.title: The Morning After: You can hang up Lenovo's new tablet - Engadget
articles.description: Today’s headlines: YouTube took down videos documenting Xinjiang human rights abuses, Lenovo's new Yoga Tabs have kickstands that double as hangers, and Apple may be exploring even bigger iPad designs..
articles.content: Companies will never stop trying new things when it comes to our tablets and laptops. While Apple might be going bigger on iPad sizes see below Lenovo added a hanger to its new Yoga Tab. It might als… [+3311 chars]
